type Mutation {
  cartCreate(input: CartCreateInput): CartCreatePayload!
  itemCreate(input: ItemCreateInput!): ItemCreatePayload!
  itemUpdate(input: ItemUpdateInput!): ItemUpdatePayload!
  itemDelete(id: ID!): ItemDeletePayload!
  orderCreate(input: OrderCreateInput!): OrderCreatePayload!
  orderUpdate(input: OrderUpdateInput!): OrderUpdatePayload!
  reviewCreate(input: ReviewCreateInput!): ReviewCreatePayload!
}

type Query {
  cart(id: ID!): Cart
  item(cartId: ID!, productId: ID!): Item
  order(id: ID!): Order
  orders(limit: Int, offset: Int): OrderConnection!
  categories(limit: Int, offset: Int): CategoryConnection!
  category(id: ID, slug: String): Category
  collections(limit: Int, offset: Int): CollectionConnection!
  collection(id: ID, slug: String): Collection
  products(limit: Int, offset: Int, filter: ProductFilterInput, orderBy: [ProductsOrderByInput!]): ProductConnection!
  product(id: ID!): Product
}

type Category {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  slug: String!
  description: String!
  image: Image
  products: [Product!]!
  createdAt: DateTime!
  updatedAt: DateTime!
}

type CategoryConnection {
  items: [Category!]!
  totalCount: Int!
}

type Collection {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  slug: String!
  description: String!
  image: Image
  products: [Product!]!
  createdAt: DateTime!
  updatedAt: DateTime!
}

type CollectionConnection {
  items: [Collection!]!
  totalCount: Int!
}

type Image {
  id: ID!
  url: String!
  alt: String
  createdAt: DateTime!
  updatedAt: DateTime!
}

type Product {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String!
  price: Int!
  popularity: Int!
  rating: Float
  colors: [Color!]!
  sizes: [Size!]!
  categories: [Category!]!
  collections: [Collection!]!
  images(limit: Int, offset: Int): [Image!]!
  reviews(limit: Int, orderBy: [ReviewOrderByInput!]): [Review!]!
  createdAt: DateTime!
  updatedAt: DateTime!
}

type ProductConnection {
  items: [Product!]!
  totalCount: Int!
}

input ProductFilterInput {
  categoryId: String
  collectionId: String
  nameContains: String
  relatedTo: String
}

input ProductsOrderByInput {
  popularity: Sort
  price: Sort
  rating: Sort
}
